item.title: Formal Notice sent to Kathleen Box, Assistant Attorney General, Consumer Protection, Washington State Office of the Attorney General
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-02_2022_0800_assistant_ag_kathleen_box_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: 18 U.S. Code § 4 - FORMAL NOTICE: DO NOT IGNORE Date sent: March 02, 2024, 20:22 +0800 (China Standard Time), March 02, 2024, 04:22 -0800 (Pacific Time) To: Kathleen Box (Assistant Attorney General · Washington State Office of the Attorney General) Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-02_2022_0800_assistant_ag_kathleen_box_Redacted.pdf Dear Ms. Box, Please be advised that this communication constitutes a formal notice under 18 U.
